DOC.brief_title: The Impact Nurses ' Emotional Labor Job Satisfaction Burnout
DOC.detailed_description: This study intend investigate association among emotional labor , job satisfaction , burnout . Furthermore , moderate effect job stress , job involvement emotional intelligence study . The study population include nurse ( N=18,446 ) Taiwan 's medical center . Of , 20 % randomly select six medical center deliver questionnaire order analyze association study variable . The level emotional labor , burnout , job satisfaction , job stress , job involvement emotional intelligence study sample collect questionnaire analyze use descriptive statistic , variance analysis , SEM techniques order understand association among study variable . Results study expected work reference improve job satisfaction decrease level burnout nurse .
